to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)

pinyin: hao3 hao3 xue2 xi2 , tian1 tian1 xiang4 shang4

sentences.english: Because ofu, I know the distance is just a number for us!
sentences.chinese: 答应你，我会为了你在西雅图好好照顾自己。

sentences.english: Felton has to be looking over his shoulder after the Bobcats made a strong play for T.
sentences.chinese: 费尔顿得好好思量一下，毕竟夏天山猫向T。

sentences.english: Stubborn smiled, said, rarely going at once, to accompany her.
sentences.chinese: 倔强的笑着，说，难得去一次，好好陪她啊。

sentences.english: Anyway, I promise you I'll try to focus on study from now on.
sentences.chinese: 总之我答应你，以后会好好学习。

sentences.english: If you really love him, please love yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果你真的喜欢他，请好好爱自己。

sentences.english: "Bad dogs make good copy, " says Grogan.
Sorry , you write on the blackboard , i understand but you speak i must think .
sentences.chinese: 这时的她在想，后悔以前怎么就没好好学英语呢？

sentences.english: Take advantage of exit interviews, and diplomatically explain your stance.
sentences.chinese: 好好利用告别的面谈，婉转的解释你的立场。

sentences.english: This was not what I'd wanted at all and had caught me little off guard to say the least - I'm supposed to be relaxing in my last few days on Hamilton Island.
sentences.chinese: 在汉密尔顿岛的最后几天，我本应该好好放松一下。

sentences.english: Take a look and you will love it!
sentences.chinese: 好好看一下这些照片，你一定会爱上它们。

sentences.english: In the next two to three years we should make thorough readjustments.
sentences.chinese: 我们在两三年内要好好地调整。

sentences.english: The most regrettable and Qu doesn't is to lose, but have, didn't cherish well.
sentences.chinese: 最遗憾啲并吥是失呿，而是拥有时，没有好好珍惜。

sentences.english: Adrian:Check anyway. I prefer charter flights to commercial ones.
sentences.chinese: 好好查查吧，比起商务舱，我还是偏好包租的座位。

sentences.english: I need get dolled up for the party.
sentences.chinese: 参加宴会，当然要好好打扮。
